attributes.action: Help persuade Hertfordshire County Council to build the Hertford bypass
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ideas about building this bypass have been discussed for years. During peak travel times Hertford becomes seriously congested, much like London. Hertford is used as a thoroughfare by drivers from the A10, as well as the A414 and A1M, it is a nightmare for those who actually live in Hertford.
